      • save

        public Sequence save(String userId,
            Sequence sequence)
              throws AuthorizationException
        Save the given Sequence into the database, with the option to rebuild the search index.
        Parameters:
        userId - unique identifier of user saving sequence
        sequence - sequence to save
        Returns:
        Saved Sequence
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - if the user does not have the permission to update the entry associated with the sequence
